about_the_game:
Realms of Survival is a Single Player / Online Multiplayer Action RPG, with a Multi-Class Character System, giving players a great variety of playstyles and customization. Fight against monsters, bosses, or other players in various open-world maps and battle scenarios.
Define your own characters in their adventures, collect items and equipment and unleash your creativity in creating the ideal adventurer.
